name: CategoryTheory.functor_thin
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
D : Type u₂
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} D
⊢ Quiver.IsThin (CategoryTheory.Functor D C)
decl:
/-- If `C` is a thin category, then `D ⥤ C` is a thin category. -/
instance functor_thin : Quiver.IsThin (D ⥤ C) := fun _ _ =>
  ⟨fun α β => NatTrans.ext (by subsingleton)⟩

name: CategoryTheory.subsingleton_iso
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
X Y : C
⊢ Subsingleton (CategoryTheory.Iso X Y)
decl:
instance subsingleton_iso {X Y : C} : Subsingleton (X ≅ Y) :=
  ⟨by
    intro i₁ i₂
    ext1
    subsingleton⟩
